00027 class DateTime : public Date
00028 {
00029     public:
00030         typedef Date Base;
00031 
00032         enum {
00034             RelativeBaseYear = 1970
00035         };
00036         
00037         enum Alignment{
00038             Zero,             //DateTime is not related to any TimeZone
00039             UniversalTime,    //DateTime is related to UT, equal to GMT(00:00) DST: 0 (Std.Time)
00040             LocalTime         //DateTime is related to LocalTime, except temporary TimeZone is set valid    
00041         };//Alignment   
00042 
00043         // struct must not be larger then 32 bit because of DataItem usage
00044         struct Persist {
00045             struct {
00046                 UINT16 m_month  : 4;
00047                 UINT16 m_minute : 6;
00048                 UINT16 m_second : 6;
00049             } m_data1;
00050             struct {
00051                 UINT16 m_day    : 5;
00052                 UINT16 m_hour   : 5;
00053             } m_data2;
00054             struct {
00055                 UINT16 m_year;
00056             } m_data3;
00057 
00058             void Reset() {
00059                 m_data1.m_month  = 0;
00060                 m_data1.m_minute = 0;
00061                 m_data1.m_second = 0;
00062                 m_data2.m_day    = 0;
00063                 m_data2.m_hour   = 0;
00064                 m_data3.m_year   = 0;
00065             }
00066             BOOLEAN IsZero() const {
00067                 return m_data1.m_month==0 || m_data2.m_day==0 || m_data3.m_year==0;
00068             }
00069             BOOLEAN IsLater(const Persist & datetime) const {
00070                 if(m_data3.m_year>datetime.m_data3.m_year) return TRUE;
00071                 if(m_data1.m_month>datetime.m_data1.m_month) return TRUE;
00072                 if(m_data2.m_day>datetime.m_data2.m_day) return TRUE;
00073                 if(m_data2.m_hour>datetime.m_data2.m_hour) return TRUE;
00074                 if(m_data1.m_minute>datetime.m_data1.m_minute) return TRUE;
00075                 if(m_data1.m_second>datetime.m_data1.m_second) return TRUE;
00076                 return FALSE;
00077             }
00078         };
00079

00082         
00084         DateTime(PresetDate pd = Today);
00085

00265         // ANSI C
00266         struct tm {
00267             INT tm_sec;     /* seconds after the minute - [0,59] */
00268             INT tm_min;     /* minutes after the hour - [0,59] */
00269             INT tm_hour;    /* hours since midnight - [0,23] */
00270             INT tm_mday;    /* day of the month - [1,31] */
00271             INT tm_mon;     /* months since January - [0,11] */
00272             INT tm_year;    /* years since 1900 */
00273             INT tm_wday;    /* days since Sunday - [0,6] */
00274             INT tm_yday;    /* days since January 1 - [0,365] */        
00275         };//struct tm
